original_text: Find out what happened many years ago. Think about everything that has happened since God created people to live on the earth. Go to anyone in the world and ask them. You will realize that nothing as great as this has ever happened before. People have never heard of anything like this.
korean_text: 네가 있기 전 하나님이 사람을 세상에 창조하신 날부터 지금까지 지나간 날을 상고하여 보라 하늘 이 끝에서 저 끝까지 이런 큰 일이 있었느냐 이런 일을 들은 적이 있었느냐

sentences.original_text: Find out what happened many years ago.
sentences.korean_translation: 수년 전에 무슨 일이 일어났는지 알아보라.

sentences.original_text: Think about everything that has happened
sentences.korean_translation: 일어난 모든 일에 대해 생각해 보라.

sentences.original_text: since God created people to live on the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 사람들을 땅에 살도록 창조하신 이후로.

sentences.original_text: Go to anyone in the world
You will realize that nothing as great as this
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이처럼 위대한 것은 아무것도 없다는 것을 깨닫게 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: People have never heard of anything like this.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 이런 것에 대해 들어본 적이 없다.
